evidence.text: Person B: Were you looking for something? Or-- someone?

Person B: Oh, wait... are you...?
Person A: I am. Though I'm sure I won't last longer at this school than at any of the others.

Person A: What do you do for fun around here?
Person B: Nothing. Until now.
Person B: It was nothing. I love helping others. Oh, and I happen to be free tonight. After all--

Person A: I feel awful.
Person B: Why? It's not like it's your fault.

Person A: Elphaba. I'm happy for you.
Person B: Yes, we are both so happy for you!
Person A: I've been thinking.
Person A: Since Doctor Di llamond had his own, Goat-like way of pronouncifying my name-- in solidarity, and to express my... uh... outrage...
